answers.answer: Medical assistance for refugees from Ukraine includes the right to receive medical care, information about health, vaccination, and assistance to HIV-infected people.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical assistance for refugees from Ukraine'.

answers.answer: Information is provided on how to use the services of a family doctor, including for patients with chronic diseases, preventive services, and home consultations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Family doctor and a basic package of services'.

answers.answer: The rules for conducting medical examinations and servicing patients in laboratories are detailed, along with a list of free laboratories for refugees.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Laboratory analyzes and imaging investigations'.

answers.answer: Information on where and how to get medical advice from a narrow specialist is available, covering the basic package of services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: Conditions for the provision of hospitalization services in public and private institutions, a list of diseases requiring hospitalization, and information on who pays for treatment are provided.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Hospitalization services in public and private institutions'.

answers.answer: The basic dental medicine package includes dentist consultation and treatment, with a complete list of dental services and their costs for all patient categories.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Dentistry in Romania: basic dental medicine package'.

answers.answer: Physical medicine and rehabilitation services provided on an outpatient basis in health resorts include a list of procedures and their duration of treatment.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical recovery, physical medicine and rehabilitation services'.

answers.answer: Medical recovery services are provided through treatment in hospitals and sanatoriums, including medical services in physical medicine and rehabilitation.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical recovery in hospitals, sanatoriums'.

answers.answer: Medical consultations at home and self-medical transportation are available in addition to the services provided in the minimum package.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical consultations at home and self-medical transportation'.

answers.answer: Information is available on which doctor can prescribe a compensated medicine and lists of medicines covered by the Health Fund.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medicines reimbursed by the Health Fund'.

answers.answer: The procedure for obtaining medical devices and a list of the basic package of medical products are provided.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical devices'.

answers.answer: Medical services are provided for patients with Covid-19, including free treatment for insured, uninsured, and other people in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Information for patients with Covid-19'.

answers.answer: Medical services for pregnant women include primary care, observation of the normal course of pregnancy, and supervision of high-risk pregnancies.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Medical services for pregnant women'.

answers.answer: Information on how to get treatment through the National Health Program package and a list of programs are available.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'National curative health programs'.

answers.answer: A Women's center offers assistance in accessing reproductive health services (e.g., contraception, breastfeeding, STD prevention, pregnancy monitoring, abortions) and services for victims of domestic violence.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medical-assistance-for-refugees and read the section under 'Get help at a Women's center'.
